tweet_text: @cmcma29 Hello Casey, thank you for reaching out to us. We are very sorry to hear this and would like to look further into this matter. Please send us a direct message with the name on the order, the order number, and your email. Please include the photos as well.

tweet_text:
Him: "There's no one else to talk to."

Me: Look, I've spent about 200 nights at Hilton properties in the last 5 or 6 years. Can't you just help me undo this simple mistake?

Him: "There's nothing I can do."

Me: Can you tell me the name of the person you consider your boss?
